description:
Enjoying takoyaki from a grateful Hatchan, he explains to the crew how to get to Fish-man Island.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gyojin-tou o Mezashite Jouriku: Sabaody Shotou
Landing on the Way to Fishman Island! The Sabaody Archipelago!
Objectif : l`île des hommes-poissons ! Arrivée sur l’archipel des Sabaody !
Остановка ради Подводного острова – архипелаг Сабаоди!
魚人島を目指して上陸 シャボンディ諸島
